basics.name: Zach (Xizhe) Hao
basics.label: Graduate Student in Electrical and Computer Engineering
basics.summary: Graduate student in Electrical and Computer Engineering at the University of Washington, specializing in Human-Computer Interaction, Wearable Computing, and Embedded Systems. Research focus on interaction techniques, AI-assisted development tools, and augmented reality.

work.name: Shenzhen Suishi Technology Co., Ltd.
highlights: Platform Development: Launched a comprehensive campus offer platform, partnering with major platforms (Meituan, Taobao, Jingdong) to provide college students with exclusive discounts on food, entertainment, and online shopping

User Experience & Interface Design: Mapped user journeys to understand user needs, designed and implemented the front end of a WeChat mini-program using JavaScript and WeChat DevTools, ensuring a smooth and intuitive user experience

Data Analysis & Strategic Planning: Used Tableau for data visualization, analyzing user trends and behaviors to inform financial management and company strategy. Implemented UI enhancements and functionality optimizations to keep users engaged

WeChat Public Account Operation & Content Creation: Created and managed content for the company's WeChat public account, focusing on topics relevant to college student growth and education. Authored a popular article achieving over 68,000 views on a single post
